synopsis.text:
Defence Forces scramble and chaos ensues as a colossal, alien creature materializes above a tranquil Japanese city, disrupting the peace. Amidst the turmoil, a fearless and curious teenager, Yuki, harbors a hidden truth. Her companion, Tetsu, has been discreetly nurturing an extraordinary being known as Cenco, whose astonishing abilities will soon come to light.

A puzzling adolescent boy, with a seemingly inexplicable bond to the city-threatening behemoth, emerges on the scene. His fixation on Tetsu's enigmatic pet dispels any uncertainty about the connection between the two creatures, sparking an unforeseen confrontation that promises to shake the city to its core. As the battle lines are drawn, the stakes are higher than ever for Yuki, Tetsu, and their mysterious new acquaintance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
